pkgmetadata.longdescription: An API for M-Estimation // Provides a general, flexible framework for estimating parameters and empirical sandwich variance estimator from a set of unbiased estimating equations (i.e., M-estimation in the vein of Stefanski Boos (2002) doi:10.1198/000313002753631330). All examples from Stefanski Boos (2002) are published in the corresponding Journal of Statistical Software paper doi:10.18637/jss.v092.i02. Also provides an API to compute finite-sample variance corrections.
